title: For Russians against Ukraine war, Putin has a cruel warning
content:
1. For Russians against Ukraine war, Putin has a cruel warning  NPR
  2. Ex-KGB agent reacts to Putin's 'terrifying' remarks  CNN
  3. Putin's inhumanity in Ukraine emerges as calls for 'self-purification' of 'traitors' as mass graves are dug  Fox News
  4. Kremlin: many people in Russia are behaving like traitors  Reuters.com
  5. Putin's chilling warning to Russian 'traitors' and 'scum' is a sign things aren't going to plan  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
